themes: generative and multiplying impact in arts funding
critique of one-off or short-term funding
key_phrases: Fund the project, not the person
fund projects that are generative, that have a multiplying effect in an arts ecosystem
instead of funding a one-off short run show, fund a consistent space that puts on multiple exhibitions
instead of funding a single artist's publicity campaign, fund arts publications
solutions_proposed: Prioritize generative projects with multiplying effects
Fund consistent spaces for multiple exhibitions
Fund arts publications instead of individual publicity campaigns
